channel.title: Making NPC's Drain Prayer?

item.title: Making NPC's Drain Prayer?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Honestly I’m not too sure on how’d you go about making it drain prayer, but we can make it so you’re not able to use prayer?
Try adding a new boolean,

public boolean inNoPray() { if(absX > coords && absX < coords && absY > coords && absY < coords || absX > coords && absX < coords && absY > coords && absY < coords) { return true; } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Making NPC's Drain Prayer?
item.dc:creator: @hunterowner3 hunterowner3
item.description:
@hunterowner3 wrote:

else if (c.prayerActive[18] && npcs[i].npcType == 8596) { damage -= damage * 0.78; }

This is my code for having my Avatar of Destruction drain prayer when it hits you. Is this correct? If so, where so I add it in NPCHandler.java? Everywhere I tried just didn’t work, I’m completely stumped. I’m using PI.

Thanks.
